name: Cropshots
description:
In Cropshots you play as a farmer that must earn as much gold as possible before the day ends. You earn gold by selling the results of your "beloved" crops, but until your crops are fully grown they won't stop shooting at you!

Controls

  • WASD or Arrows to move
  • Space bar to throw to the floor and dodge bullets
  • J,Z or E to grab seeds, plant crops and sell items in the truck
  • ESC to pause the game

Game created by:

Please note that...

  • We will try to add Mac and Linux downloads soon.

  • If you find any problem do not hesitate to leave a comment. Thanks!
